attributes.action: Give me a weekend getaway to Atlantis Paradise Island Hotel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plz give me a weekend getaway to the Bahamas!I need my time to have a vacation to myself and not be a procrastinator in hw!i'll be sincere to the hotel members, watch tv, swim in the pool, play video games, and more. I want to thank my mom, my dad, my brother, my sister, Morgan,Fiona, Caroline, Nia, Jewelie, Isabelle, Irene, Isobel, Anthony, Erica, Phoebe, Ray, Ms. D, Cousin Leah,Marisa, Shayna, Elizabeth,Nicki, Mr. Gesick, Ms. Dolan, Ms. Nolan, Mr. OrRourke, Mr. Burnash, Mr. Reben, Mr. Rainaldi,
Ms. Crowley, Mr. Chiapperelli, Jackie, Oren, Carmela, Andrea, Carla, Vanessa, Mattchew Roque,Ms. McGowan, Janice, Paige, Alex, George, Marge, Jamie, Jennifer, Erica, Alex Linder,Emma, Joe, Christine, Lindzie, Joseph, Olivia, Molly, and other ppl!Plz sign me up for a getaway ill do anything!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
